mapper.insert:
INSERT ALL
INTO MSSAPP.MC_STK_TXN (STK_TXN_ID, REV_STK_TXN_ID, STK_APRV_STAT_CDE, IS_REV, IS_AWAITING, REC_VER_NUM, INIT_TIME, LAST_UPD_TIME, LAST_UPD_BY, TAG_SEQ) VALUES (#{item.stkTxnId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.revStkTxnId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.stkAprvStatCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isRev,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isAwaiting,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.recVerNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.initTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastUpdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastUpdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tagSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT})
SELECT 1 FROM DUAL
